content.prompt: Which of the following will cause the demand for a normal good to increase?

choices.label: A decrease in the price of a complementary good
A decrease in the price of a substitute good
A decrease in the price of the good
A decrease in the number of consumers

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
